value.name: Disabled five-year-old ‘excited’ to spend first proper Christmas with buddy dog
value.description: The mother of a severely disabled child whose face “lit up with joy” when he got a buddy dog says the youngster is “excited” to spend his first proper Christmas with the pet. Nicole Dodd-Moore’s five-year-old son JJ is severely disabled, immobile and non-verbal.

value.name: Starmer can kick BBC licence fee political football into touch
value.description: Wise heads believe it’s time to kick the licence fee political football into touch. Expect an incoming Labour government to consider creating an independent panel to set the level, removing the big stick Downing Street wields over the corporation.
